_source.text: [29] The most deprived areas are Southwick to the north of the river and Thorney Close to the south - both with chronic levels of unemployment, although the city is performing better than the North East as a whole.

text: - both with chronic levels of unemployment, although the city is performing **better** **than** the **North** **East** as a whole.
[29] The most deprived areas are Southwick to the **north** of the river and Thorney Close to the **south**

_source.text: 3. Plots facing North or East are better than those facing South or West.

text: 3. Plots facing **North** or **East** are **better** **than** those facing **South** or West.

_source.text: ack I think I meant north-south but don't you think that when you have wider beds it is better to go east-west then the sun runs along each plant -if you will?

text: ack I think I meant **north**-**south** but don't you think that when you have wider beds it **is** **better** to
go **east**-west then the sun runs along each plant -if you will?

_source.text: "A Fair Tax is better for Illinois, top to bottom east to west, north to south.

text: "A Fair Tax **is** **better** for Illinois, top to bottom **east** to west, **north** to **south**.

_source.text: 5. If the length of the plot in east-west direction is more than that in north-south direction, it is better.

text: 5. If the length of the plot in **east**-west direction is more than that in **north**-**south** direction, it **is** **better**.

_source.text: A bit woozy from the high-quality experience, I wondered, as our bullet train barreled 5½ hours south and east to the steel-wool skies of cold, impersonal Moscow, could it possibly get any better than this?

text: A bit woozy from the high-quality experience, I wondered, as our bullet train barreled 5½ hours **south** and **east** to the steel-**wool** skies of cold, impersonal Moscow, could it possibly get any **better** **than** this?
